labels.headline: Main Headline
labels.billingText: Please select an API key to continue.
labels.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this item? This action cannot be undone.

placeholders.story: Describe the plot idea for your comic page...
placeholders.headline: e.g., Explosive Energy
placeholders.desc: Describe the product or desired visuals...
placeholders.topic: e.g., Life cycle of a star

guide.title: Start here! Describe your story idea or click a suggestion below.

cyberpunkDetective.full: A dark cyberpunk detective scene where a gritty investigator examines a glowing holographic clue in a rainy alley filled with neon lights.

wizardLibrary.full: A wide-angle view of a magical library with floating books, glowing runes, and a young wizard casting a spell that creates a whirl of light.

cozyCatCafe.full: A warm slice-of-life scene inside a sunny cat café. Detailed pastries on the table, cats sleeping on shelves, and customers chatting happily.

spaceBattle.full: An intense sci-fi space battle. A small rebel fighter dodges laser beams from a massive dreadnought near a collapsing blue star.

story.label: Create New Story
story.prompt: Generate a completely new story based on the description.

continue.label: Draw Next Page
continue.prompt: Reference image is the previous page. Draw the NEXT PAGE of this story.

mix.label: Mix Characters/Scenes
mix.prompt: Combine visual elements and characters from the reference images into a new scenario.

remake.label: Re-draw with New Style
remake.prompt: Keep the layout of the reference image but redraw it with the selected art style.

ui.emptyState: Use the left panel to configure your design.
ui.frameCountNote: Gemini will creatively arrange these {count} panels.

seo.title: Create Comics, Ads & Infographics with AI - Gemini Banana Pro
seo.description: Use AI to create professional comics, advertisement designs, and infographics. Powerful creative tool powered by Google Gemini AI.
